article.bdy:
CDP may stand for:
People
Chef de Partie, a "station chef" or "line cook", is in charge of a particular area of production
Collett Dickenson Pearce, a British advertising agency
Places
Census-designated place
, an unincorporated area in the U.S. for which Census data is available at the community level
Cuddapah Airport , the IATA code for the airport in India
Technology/Computer
Cache Discovery Protocol
, an extension to the BitTorrent file-distribution system
Cisco Discovery Protocol
, a proprietary layer 2 network protocol developed by Cisco Systems
Columbia Data Products, formerly a computer manufacturer, now a software company
Composers Desktop Project, non-realtime audio digital-signal processing (DSP) software
Content Delivery Platform
, a system for managing and deploying web content
Continuous Data Protection, also called Continuous Backup or Continuous Vaulting, refers to backup of computer data by automatically saving a copy of every change made to that data
Control Design Platform, an integrated software development environment for developing control systems in C++
Compact Disc Player, an electronic device which plays audio Compact Discs
CRL Distribution Point, a certificate extension that indicates where the certificate revocation list for a CA can be retrieved. This extension can contain multiple HTTP, FTP, File or LDAP URLs for the retrieval of the CRL.
Certified Data Professional, a professional certification conferred by the ICCP.
Other
Congregation of the Sisters of Divine Providence (Congregatio Divinae Providentiae), a catholic religious order that was founded in 1851 in Germany
Carbon Disclosure Project
Christian Democratic Party, the name of a political party in several countries
Congress for Democracy and Progress, a political party of Burkina Faso
Cytidine diphosphate, a nucleotide
Cajun Dance Party , an English 5-piece indie band
CD Projekt , a Polish computer game publisher and developer
Clean Desk Policy, A corporate policy to make sure that sensitive information is removed from the desk.
Central Depository Pte Ltd, a central depository for equities in Singapore
This page lists articles associated with the same title. If an internal linkled you here, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.''
